events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under our Engineering department for further assessment by the hiring team.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to your candidacy to assist you with the next steps.
Your initial screening interview went well, and we are excited to move forward with scheduling a technical interview.
Thank you for confirming your availability. We appreciate your prompt response regarding the technical interview schedule.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for March 12th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and contact us if needed.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills and expertise.
An HR interview has been scheduled for March 18th. This will cover cultural fit and company policies.
Your HR interview went positively, and the team is excited about your alignment with our company culture.
We are pleased to propose a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including details about compensation and benefits.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you onboard as a new Software Engineer with our company.
Your onboarding has officially started, including orientation sessions and setting up your development environment.
The hiring process is now complete, and we are delighted to have you as a valuable member of our engineering team.
